001package org.jfree.chart.renderer;
002
003
004import java.util.Map;
005import org.jfree.chart.event.RendererChangeEvent;
006import java.io.Serializable;
007
008public class AbstractRendererProduct3 implements Serializable, Cloneable {
009        private Map<Integer, Boolean> seriesVisibleMap;
010        private boolean defaultSeriesVisible;
011
012        public Map<Integer, Boolean> getSeriesVisibleMap() {
013                return seriesVisibleMap;
014        }
015
016        public void setSeriesVisibleMap(Map<Integer, Boolean> seriesVisibleMap) {
017                this.seriesVisibleMap = seriesVisibleMap;
018        }
019
020        public boolean getDefaultSeriesVisible() {
021                return defaultSeriesVisible;
022        }
023
024        public void setDefaultSeriesVisible2(boolean defaultSeriesVisible) {
025                this.defaultSeriesVisible = defaultSeriesVisible;
026        }
027
028        /**
029        * Returns a boolean that indicates whether or not the specified series should be drawn.  In fact this method should be named  lookupSeriesVisible() to be consistent with the other series attributes and avoid confusion with the getSeriesVisible() method.
030        * @param series   the series index.
031        * @return  A boolean.
032        */
033        public boolean isSeriesVisible(int series) {
034                boolean result = this.defaultSeriesVisible;
035                Boolean b = this.seriesVisibleMap.get(series);
036                if (b != null) {
037                        result = b;
038                }
039                return result;
040        }
041
042        /**
043        * Sets the default series visibility and, if requested, sends a  {@link RendererChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners.
044        * @param visible   the visibility.
045        * @param notify   notify listeners?
046        * @see #getDefaultSeriesVisible()
047        */
048        public void setDefaultSeriesVisible(boolean visible, boolean notify, AbstractRenderer abstractRenderer) {
049                this.defaultSeriesVisible = visible;
050                if (notify) {
051                        RendererChangeEvent e = new RendererChangeEvent(abstractRenderer, true);
052                        abstractRenderer.notifyListeners(e);
053                }
054        }
055
056        public Object clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException {
057                return (AbstractRendererProduct3) super.clone();
058        }
059}
